description: The family unit has undergone tectonic shifts. Now itâ€™s up to society to ensure nobody is left behind in Singapore. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Family and the loss of belonging in Singapore
title_page: Family and the loss of belonging in Singapore | The Straits Times
maintext:
Uncle T is a family friend who works as a lorry driver six days a week.
His day typically begins at 5am, when he ferries a handful of workers from their dormitory to their workplaces, often from one end of the island to the other.
